reviews.review_msg: painful.  I liked the class, but it was hard.  Was geared more towards a crim student than psyc.  Exams were difficult, and long (multiple choice, short answer and longer answer.)  I wouldn't take another class of hers.
This class was insane - she teaches at a 2nd year level, but her exams are based on 3rd/4th yr level.Exams insanely difficult.RUDE when ask for help,and completely unfair marker.don't waste your time
